channel.title: Ora Browser Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 0.2.7
item.description:
Ora Browser v0.2.7

Changes since last release:

Features

  • feat: clear cache and cookie reload (#149) — Brooksolomon

Fixes

  • fix: weird favicon loading and handling by accept custom favicon URL (#156) — Kenenisa Alemayehu
  • fix(inspector): wrap WKWebView in NSView to prevent flashing inspector section (#150) — Furkan Koseoglu

Other

  • Update README to mark private browsing mode as completed — Kenenisa Alemayehu
